what: Helper Functions for the motrpacWATData Package
title: Helper Functions for the motrpacWATData Package
text: collection functions analysis visualization MoTrPAC PASS1B white adipose tissue (WAT) data provided MotrpacRatTraining6moData package. package built specifically generate motrpacWATData package, much tailored use datasets, though users may find functionality contained herein useful projects: Differential analysis (DA) limma edgeR packages Volcano plots Fast Gene Set Enrichment Analysis (FGSEA) fgsea msigdbr Kinase-Substrate Enrichment Analysis (KSEA) PhosphoSitePlus -representation analysis (ORA) Weighted Gene Co-expression Network Analysis (WGCNA)

title: Helper Functions for the motrpacWATData Package
text: Install package devtools:

title: Enrichment Heatmap — enrichmat
text: Creates heatmap summarizing FGSEA results.

title: Enrichment Heatmap — enrichmat
code: enrichmat(   x,   n_top = 15,   top_pathways = NULL,   rownames_column = "pathway",   NES_column = "NES",   padj_column = "padj",   padj_legend_title = padj_column,   padj_cutoff = 0.05,   plot_sig_only = TRUE,   padj_fill = "grey",   colors = c("#3366ff", "darkred"),   scale_by = c("row", "column", "none"),   cell_size = unit(14, "points"),   filename = character(0),   height = 5,   width = 5,   units = "in",   heatmap_args = list(),   padj_args = list(),   save_args = list(),   draw_args = list() )

title: Enrichment Heatmap — enrichmat
text: x object class data.frame; output fgsea fgsea2. Must contain "contrast" column. n_top integer; number pathways display. Defaults top 15 pathways significantly enriched across contrasts. top_pathways character; vector specific pathways display. NULL (default), n_top pathways displayed instead. rownames_column character; name column x containing unique identifiers used rownames heatmap. Default "pathway". NES_column similar rownames_column. name column containing normalized enrichment scores (NES) determines heatmap body colors. Values -1 +1 (noise) appear white. padj_column similar rownames_column. name column containing adjusted p-values determine area circle heatmap. padj_legend_title character; title background fill legend. Defaults padj_column. padj_cutoff numeric; cutoff terms statistically significant. plot_sig_only=TRUE, pathways least one padj_column value less threshold may appear heatmap. Default 0.05. plot_sig_only logical; whether plot n_top terms least one padj_column value less padj_cutoff. padj_fill character; background color used values padj_column less padj_cutoff. Default "lightgrey". colors character; vector length 2 specifying colors largest negative largest positive values, respectively. Defaults blue (#3366ff) red (specifically, darkred). scale_by character; whether scale circles -significant term row (scale_by="row"), column (scale_by="column"), overall (scale_by="none") maximum area. Default "row" better visualize patterns across contrasts. cell_size unit object; size heatmap cell. Default unit(14, "points"). filename character; filename used save heatmap. character(0) (default), heatmap displayed instead. height numeric; height file units. width height. units character; units define height width. Defaults "" (inches). heatmap_args list; additional arguments passed Heatmap. padj_args list; additional arguments passed Legend. Modifies adjusted p-value legend. save_args list; additional arguments passed graphics device. See png options. draw_args list; additional arguments passed draw-HeatmapList-method.

title: Enrichment Heatmap — enrichmat
text: Tyler Sagendorf

what: Fast Gene Set Enrichment Analysis — fgsea2
title: Fast Gene Set Enrichment Analysis — fgsea2
text: Custom wrapper fgsea use   output msigdbr2.

title: Fast Gene Set Enrichment Analysis — fgsea2
code: fgsea2(   pathways,   stats,   gene_column = "entrez_gene",   adjust.method = "BH",   adjust.globally = TRUE,   seed = NULL,   ... )

title: Fast Gene Set Enrichment Analysis — fgsea2
text: pathways output msigdbr2. stats output get_ranking. gene_column character string; name column pathways containing genes pathway. adjust.method character string; p-value correction method. Can abbreviated. See p.adjust.methods. adjust.globally logical; p-values contrasts adjusted together using adjust.method? Set FALSE contrasts tested closely related. seed numeric NULL; passed set.seed. ... additional arguments passed fgseaMultilevel.

title: Fast Gene Set Enrichment Analysis — fgsea2
text: data.table results   contrast. See fgsea details.

title: Fast Gene Set Enrichment Analysis — fgsea2
text: Tyler Sagendorf

title: Over-representation analysis — fora2
text: Custom wrapper fora.

title: Over-representation analysis — fora2
code: fora2(   pathways,   genes,   universe,   gene_column = "entrez_gene",   minSize = 1,   maxSize = Inf,   adjust.method = "scale",   adjust.globally = TRUE )

title: Over-representation analysis — fora2
text: pathways output link{msigdbr2}. genes named list genes. universe character vector background genes. gene_column character; name column pathways containing elements gene set. minSize integer; minimum size gene sets allowed testing. maxSize integer; maximum size gene sets allowed testing. adjust.method character string; p-value correction method. Either "scale" (default), compute scaled p-values one p.adjust.methods. adjust.globally logical; p-values contrasts adjusted together using adjust.method? Set FALSE contrasts tested closely related.

title: Over-representation analysis — fora2
text: Tyler Sagendorf

what: Calculate ranking metric values by contrast — get_ranking
title: Calculate ranking metric values by contrast — get_ranking
text: Calculate ranking metric values used   fgsea2.

title: Calculate ranking metric values by contrast — get_ranking
Calculate ranking metric values by contrast — get_ranking
text: x object class data.frame. Typically results limma_full. genes string; name column x. ranking metric value calculated unique entry. Can gene symbols, Entrez IDs, Ensembl genes. metric string; specifies ranking metric calculated x. Can name single column. contrast_column string; name column x. Entries column set names output list.

title: Calculate ranking metric values by contrast — get_ranking
text: named vector ("contrast" column) list sorted ranking   metric values contrast x.

title: Calculate ranking metric values by contrast — get_ranking
text: -log\(_{10}\)-transformed p-value signed fold-change   similar using t-statistics, provides better separation   extreme values tails close 0   interesting. log2 fold-change used ranking metric,   capture variability measurements.

text: object object class link[MSnbase:MSnSet-class]{MSnSet}.

title: MDS plots with ggplot2 — ggplotMDS

Label p-values according to significance — label_signif

title: Label p-values according to significance — label_signif
LIMMA Convenience Wrapper — limma_full
text: convenience wrapper differential analysis LIMMA.   Performs moderated t-tests, F-tests, linear regression.

title: LIMMA Convenience Wrapper — limma_full
code: limma_full(   object,   model.str,   coef.str,   contrasts,   trend = TRUE,   robust = TRUE,   var.group = character(0),   block = NULL,   plot = FALSE,   adjust.method = "BH",   adjust.globally = TRUE,   ... )

title: LIMMA Convenience Wrapper — limma_full
text: object Object class MSnSet. exprs slot can either matrix log\(_2\) relative abundances counts. latter, limma--edgeR pipeline (https://doi.org/10.12688/f1000research.9005.3) automatically used. model.str character; formulation model (e.g. "~ + b"). contrasts provided, -intercept model (include 0 -1 terms). See lm details. coef.str character; coefficient interest. One colnames(pData(object)). contrasts character; optional contrasts form "-b" test. trend logical; intensity-dependent trend allowed prior variance? FALSE, prior variance constant. Alternatively, trend can row-wise numeric vector, used covariate prior variance. See eBayes details. robust logical; estimation df.prior var.prior robustified outlier sample variances? See eBayes details. var.group character; column pData(object) indicating groups different relative quality weights. default (character(0)) weight sample equally (samples given weight 1). Weights affect logFC P.Value columns results. block NULL character; name column pData(object) specifying blocking variable. Passed duplicateCorrelation. See use duplicateCorrelation. Section 9.7 "Multi-level Experiments" LIMMA User's Guide explains use duplicateCorrelation. Currently ignored exprs(object) matrix counts. plot logical; whether generate diagnostic plots. TRUE, generates barplot weights applied sample plot mean-variance trend using plotSA. adjust.method method p-value adjustment. Default "BH" (Benjamini-Hochberg), control false discovery rate (FDR). See p.adjust details. adjust.globally logical; p-values contrasts adjusted together using adjust.method? Set FALSE contrasts tested closely related. See "Multiple Testing Across Contrasts" section LIMMA User's Guide (linked "See Also") information. ... additional arguments passed plotSA.

title: LIMMA Convenience Wrapper — limma_full
text: data.frame. Output topTable   additional columns feature, contrast, column(s)   standard error (se) logFC. columns fData also   included.

title: LIMMA Convenience Wrapper — limma_full
text: MDS plot (produced plotMDS) used   determine appropriate value var.group. samples within   phenotype groups tend cluster well similar dispersions,   default var.group = character(0) recommended. samples within   phenotype groups tend cluster well, different groups   less dispersed, may beneficial set var.group name   phenotype column. one samples tend cluster poorly   samples phenotype, may beneficial weight sample.   , set var.group name column   pData(object) uniquely identifies sample. variation   samples groups samples biological rather technical,   weighting recommended. plot mean-variance trend helps determine whether fit trend   line prior variance (default trend = TRUE). also helps   determine prior variance robustified outlier   sample variances (robust = TRUE). See eBayes   details.

title: LIMMA Convenience Wrapper — limma_full
text: Smyth G. K. (2004). Linear models empirical bayes methods   assessing differential expression microarray experiments.   Statistical applications genetics molecular biology, 3,   Article3. https://doi.org/10.2202/1544-6115.1027 Smyth, G. K., Michaud, J., Scott, H. (2005). use within-array   replicate spots assessing differential expression microarray   experiments. Bioinformatics 21(9), 2067--2075.   http://bioinformatics.oxfordjournals.org/content/21/9/2067 Preprint   corrections: http://www.statsci.org/smyth/pubs/dupcor.pdf Liu, R., Holik, . Z., Su, S., Jansz, N., Chen, K., Leong, H. S., Blewitt,   M. E., Asselin-Labat, M. L., Smyth, G. K., & Ritchie, M. E. (2015).   weight? Modelling sample observational level variability improves power   RNA-seq analyses. Nucleic acids research, 43(15), e97.   https://doi.org/10.1093/nar/gkv412 Law, C. W., Alhamdoosh, M., Su, S., Dong, X., Tian, L., Smyth, G. K., &   Ritchie, M. E. (2016). RNA-seq analysis easy 1-2-3 limma, Glimma   edgeR. F1000Research, 5, ISCB Comm J-1408.   https://doi.org/10.12688/f1000research.9005.3 Phipson, B., Lee, S., Majewski, . J., Alexander, W. S., & Smyth, G. K.   (2016). ROBUST HYPERPARAMETER ESTIMATION PROTECTS HYPERVARIABLE   GENES IMPROVES POWER DETECT DIFFERENTIAL EXPRESSION.   annals applied statistics, 10(2), 946--963.   https://doi.org/10.1214/16-AOAS920

what: Get gene sets / pathways from MSigDB — msigdbr2
title: Get gene sets / pathways from MSigDB — msigdbr2
text: Wrapper around msigdbr. Reformats pathway   data use fgsea2.

title: Get gene sets / pathways from MSigDB — msigdbr2
code: msigdbr2(   species = "Homo sapiens",   genes = c("gene_symbol", "entrez_gene", "ensembl_gene"),   gs_subcat,   capitalize = FALSE )

title: Get gene sets / pathways from MSigDB — msigdbr2
text: species character; scientific common name species. Default "Homo sapiens". msigdbr_species displays possible choices. genes character; type gene ID fetch. Options "gene_symbol", "entrez_gene", "ensembl_gene". gs_subcat character vector one MSigDB subcategories. See msigdbr_collections details. capitalize logical; whether capitalize first letter description first word contain mix capital lowercase letters. Improves appearance plots, produced enrichmat.

title: Get gene sets / pathways from MSigDB — msigdbr2
text: data.table columns   "gs_exact_source" (term ID), "gs_subcat" (subcategory), "gs_description"   (term description), list column gene IDs specified  genes.

title: Get gene sets / pathways from MSigDB — msigdbr2
text: Liberzon, ., Birger, C., Thorvaldsdóttir, H., Ghandi, M.,   Mesirov, J. P., & Tamayo, P. (2015). Molecular Signatures Database   (MSigDB) hallmark gene set collection. Cell systems, 1(6), 417--425.   https://doi.org/10.1016/j.cels.2015.12.004 Dolgalev, . (2022). msigdbr: MSigDB Gene Sets Multiple Organisms   Tidy Data Format. R package version 7.5.1,   https:://igordot.github.io/msigdbr

title: Get gene sets / pathways from MSigDB — msigdbr2
code: x <- msigdbr2(species = "rat",               genes = "gene_symbol",               gs_subcat = c("CP:REACTOME", "GO:MF")) #> Updating GO term descriptions with http://release.geneontology.org/2021-12-15/ontology/go-basic.obo

title: Plot module ORA results — plot_ORA
text: Dotplot top -represented terms WGCNA module.

title: Plot module ORA results — plot_ORA
code: plot_ORA(   x,   n_terms = 5,   mods = 1:5,   gs_subcat = "GO:MF",   rel_heights = c(0.8, 0.2) )

title: Plot module ORA results — plot_ORA
text: x output fora fora2. n_terms integer; maximum number top -represented terms display module. mods integer; module numbers include plot. default, terms modules 1-5 (5 largest modules) shown. gs_subcat character; gene set subcategory terms plot. Default "GO:MF". rel_heights numeric; vector length 2 specifying relative heights plot color legend, respectively. Default c(0.8, 0.2).

title: Plot module ORA results — plot_ORA
text: ggplot object.

title: Visualize clinical analyte data — plot_analyte
text: Generate scatterplot clinical analyte values.

title: Visualize clinical analyte data — plot_analyte
text: x data.frame required columns value, sex, timepoint. analyte character; name column x.

title: Visualize WGCNA module eigenfeatures — plot_eigenfeature
text: Create scatterplots module eigenfeature (principal   eigenvectors).

title: Visualize WGCNA module eigenfeatures — plot_eigenfeature
text: x output run_WGCNA.

title: Create Annotated UpSet Plot — plot_upset
text: Create UpSet plot annotated intersection set sizes.   Essentially modified version UpSet.

title: Create Annotated UpSet Plot — plot_upset
code: plot_upset(   x,   top_n_comb = 10,   comb_title = "Intersection\nSize",   set_title = "Set Size",   scale = 2,   barplot_args = list(),   filename = character(0),   height = 2 * scale,   width = 3.4 * scale,   units = "in",   save_args = list(),   upset_args = list() )

title: Create Annotated UpSet Plot — plot_upset
text: x list; named list elements set. Passed make_comb_mat. top_n_comb numeric; number largest intersections show. Default 10. comb_title character; title top barplot annotation. Default "Intersection Size". set_title character; title right barplot annotation. Default "Set Size". scale numeric; scaling factor plot elements. Improves appearance. Default 2. barplot_args list; additional arguments passed anno_barplot. filename character; filename used save UpSet plot. provided, plot displayed. height numeric; save height. width numeric; save width. units character; units height width. Default "" (inches). save_args list; additional arguments passed graphics device. See png options. upset_args list; additional arguments passed UpSet.

title: Create Annotated UpSet Plot — plot_upset
text: See UpSet details sections   mentioned Arguments.

title: Create Annotated UpSet Plot — plot_upset
text: Lex, ., Gehlenborg, N., Strobelt, H., Vuillemot, R., & Pfister,   H. (2014). UpSet: Visualization Intersecting Sets. IEEE   transactions visualization computer graphics, 20(12), 1983--1992.   https://doi.org/10.1109/TVCG.2014.2346248

title: Create Volcano Plot — plot_volcano
text: Create volcano plot.

title: Create Volcano Plot — plot_volcano
text: x matrix data.frame containing differential analysis results. Must include columns logFC, log10_pval, sign_logFC, contrast, label. pval_cutoff numeric; cutoff p-values considered significant. Adds dashed horizontal line plot. colors character; length 3 vector significantly negative, significantly positive, non-significant (NS) logFC colors.

title: Create Volcano Plot — plot_volcano
text: ggplot2 object.

title: Create p-value Histograms — pval_hist
text: x matrix data.frame containing differential analysis results. Must include columns logFC, log10_pval, sign_logFC, contrast, label. pval character; name column x containing p-values adjusted p-values. ylims numeric vector length 2. Limits y-axis.

title: Create p-value Histograms — pval_hist

text: range_extend returns vector containing minimum   maximum given arguments rounded outward value provided   nearest.

text: x numeric object. nearest numeric; range x rounded value specified nearest. Default 1.

title: Extended Range of Values — range_extend
text: numeric vector length 2 specifying   range values rounding outward value provided  nearest.

title: Extended Range of Values — range_extend
text: Tyler Sagendorf

title: Run WGCNA Pipeline — run_WGCNA
text: Run WGCNA pipeline used WAT manuscript.

title: Run WGCNA Pipeline — run_WGCNA
code: run_WGCNA(   object,   power = 1:20,   RsquaredCut = 0.9,   module_prefix = "",   merge_modules )

title: Run WGCNA Pipeline — run_WGCNA
text: object object class MSnSet. exprs matrix log\(_2\)-transformed values. Count data accepted. power integer; optional soft power vector (length 1 greater). specified, lowest value 1:20 satisfies scale-free fit R\(^2\) least equal RsquaredCut used. RsquaredCut numeric; desired minimum scale-free fit R\(^2\). Ignored power provided. module_prefix character; append module numbers create "moduleID" column fData(object). merge_modules logical; provided, user input requested determine whether highly-correlated (r=0.85) modules combined based plots function creates. Must provided session interactive.

title: Run WGCNA Pipeline — run_WGCNA
text: Object class MSnSet   modified pData fData. pData include   columns module eigenfeatures (prefixed ""   followed color), fData include columns   "moduleColor" "moduleID" specify modules feature   belongs. Features "grey" module ignored.

title: Run WGCNA Pipeline — run_WGCNA
text: Zhang, B., & Horvath, S. (2005). general framework weighted   gene co-expression network analysis. Statistical applications   genetics molecular biology, 4, Article17.   https://doi.org/10.2202/1544-6115.1128 Langfelder P Horvath S, WGCNA: R package weighted correlation   network analysis. BMC Bioinformatics 2008, 9:559   https://doi.org/10.1186/1471-2105-9-559 Peter Langfelder, Steve Horvath (2012). Fast R Functions Robust   Correlations Hierarchical Clustering. Journal Statistical   Software, 46(11), 1--17. http://www.jstatsoft.org/v46/i11/ Horvath, S. (2011). Weighted Network Analysis. Springer New York.   https://doi.org/10.1007/978-1-4419-8819-5 Langfelder P, Zhang B, Horvath wcfS (2016). dynamicTreeCut: Methods   Detection Clusters Hierarchical Clustering Dendrograms. R   package version 1.63-1,   https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=dynamicTreeCut.

title: Run WGCNA Pipeline — run_WGCNA
text: Tyler Sagendorf, Zhenxin Hou

what: Update Gene Ontology term descriptions — update_GO_names

text: Update entries gs_description column   msigdbr results use terms   Gene Ontology Consortium.

title: Update Gene Ontology term descriptions — update_GO_names
Update Gene Ontology term descriptions — update_GO_names
text: x object class data.frame produced link[msigdbr]{msigdbr} msigdbr2 containing columns gs_description gs_subcat. version character string specifying version msigdbr use. Defaults current version. capitalize logical; whether capitalize first letter description first word contain mix capital lowercase letters. Improves appearance plots, produced enrichmat.

title: Update Gene Ontology term descriptions — update_GO_names
text: Object class data.frame. x,   updated descriptions.

title: Update Gene Ontology term descriptions — update_GO_names
text: function assumes phrase "GO-basic obo file released   " present MSigDB release notes version followed   date.

title: Update Gene Ontology term descriptions — update_GO_names
text: Ashburner, M., et al. (2000). Gene ontology: tool   unification biology. Gene Ontology Consortium. Nature   genetics, 25(1), 25--29. https://doi.org/10.1038/75556 Gene Ontology Consortium (2021). Gene Ontology resource: enriching   GOld mine. Nucleic acids research, 49(D1), D325--D334.   https://doi.org/10.1093/nar/gkaa1113

title: Update Gene Ontology term descriptions — update_GO_names
text: Tyler Sagendorf

title: Update Gene Ontology term descriptions — update_GO_names
code: x <- msigdbr2(species = "Homo sapiens",               genes = "gene_symbol",               gs_subcat = "GO:MF") #> Updating GO term descriptions with http://release.geneontology.org/2021-12-15/ontology/go-basic.obo tail(x$gs_description) # before #> [1] "Wnt-protein binding"                           #> [2] "WW domain binding"                             #> [3] "xenobiotic transmembrane transporter activity" #> [4] "Y-form DNA binding"                            #> [5] "zinc ion binding"                              #> [6] "zinc ion transmembrane transporter activity"    x <- update_GO_names(x) #> Updating GO term descriptions with http://release.geneontology.org/2021-12-15/ontology/go-basic.obo tail(x$gs_description) # after #> [1] "Wnt-protein binding"                           #> [2] "WW domain binding"                             #> [3] "xenobiotic transmembrane transporter activity" #> [4] "Y-form DNA binding"                            #> [5] "zinc ion binding"                              #> [6] "zinc ion transmembrane transporter activity"
